mapper.select:
select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName,sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0)) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital in
AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y')
group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital where t2.cnt>0 group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.item_code itemCode,t1.item_name itemName,sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0)) count from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital in AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.hospital where length(t1.item_code)=10 and t1.id in and t2.cnt>0 group by t1.item_code order by count desc

select t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id itemCode, case t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id when 1 then "一级医院" when 2 then "二级医院" when 3 then "三级医院" when 4 then "社区医院" else "" end itemName, round(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),0) count from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital in AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.hospital where t1.id in and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id is not null and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id!="" and length(t1.item_code)=10 and t2.cnt>0 group by t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.parent_item_code = #{parentId} and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10)
AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y')
group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital where t2.cnt>0 order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select concat(b.hospital,'-',b.dept_code) itemCode,b.dept_name itemName from ods.dept_dict b where b.hospital=#{hspId} ) t1 left join ( select concat(t.hospital,'-',t.dept_code) itemCode,SUM(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital= #{hspId} AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') group by concat(t.hospital,'-',t.dept_code) ) t2 on t1.itemCode=t2.itemCode where t2.cnt>0 order by ifnull(t2.cnt,0) desc

SELECT hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (SELECT SUM(Bed_icu) thisYearCount FROM ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') and t.hospital in AND t.hospital=hsp.id) countNew,
(SELECT SUM(Bed_icu) agoYearCount FROM ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') = (DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y')- 1) AND t.hospital in AND t.hospital=hsp.id) countOld
FROM hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp WHERE hsp.id in AND LENGTH(hsp.id)=10

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from (select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id IN and length(hcb.id)=10) t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, SUM(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital IN and DATE_FORMAT(YEAR, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode

select t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.count,0) count from ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.bed_record t where t.hospital IN group by t.charge_type) t1 left join ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.bed_record t where t.hospital IN and t.Create_date >= #{startDate} and t.Create_date<= #{endDate} and t.Severe_bed_state='0' group by t.charge_type) t2 on t1.itemName = t2.itemName order by t1.itemName

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t2.dateData dateData,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id IN and length(hcb.id)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital,date_format(t.Year,'%Y') dateData, SUM(Bed_icu) cnt from ods.ODS_HOSPITAL_RESOURCE_NEW t where t.hospital IN AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y')
AND DATE_FORMAT(Year,'%Y') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') group by t.hospital,dateData ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode
